name: Lando Norris
review: What I learned from this web development course besides course topic is patience, time management, learn new things everyday and never give up.

name: Max Verstappen
review: It is an excellent course for beginners. I appreciate Skill.Grow team for their sincerity, cooperation and support. It was a great journey for me.

name: Lewis Hamilton
review: This course is different from the others. This course made me a stronger, hard working and dedicated person. And I'm thanking the whole Skill.Grow team for their exceptional teaching process

name: Ariana G.
review: Comprehensive course for anyone starting out in web development. Covers HTML5, CSS3, JS and Bootstrap for responsive design. Rightly focuses on web accessibility, New frameworks keep coming up. This is a good foundation to begin before moving on to frameworks such as Angular, React, Vue etc.

name: Esteben Ocon
review: Whoa! I finally completed it! Thanks to the Professor and teaching staff for all the help! This is a fabulous course and I would definitely recommend it to anyone interested in UI-UX design. :)

name: Alex Albon
review: This course has been so great. It has provided me with practical knowledge and skills on website designing and development.
